name: Genizid
description:
"Dein Name ist Markus. Früher hast du in Biologie-Lehrfilmen mitgespielt, aber eine abartige Kreatur namens Geni hat dich abgelöst. Es ist Zeit Rache zu üben und diese Ausgeburt der Hölle zu töten!"

Made with the Godot Engine

There might be some bugs lol

I used some free assets to make this game because I suck at game art. Here are  my sources:
Music by Alex-Productions:
https://www.chosic.com/download-audio/31970/
Player Sprite by rgsdev:
https://rgsdev.itch.io/animated-top-down-character-base-template-in-pixel-art-rgsdev
Gun Sprite by kingkelp:
https://kingkelp.itch.io/8gunshttps://kingkelp.itch.io/8guns
Gun Sound by battlestar10:
https://soundbible.com/1666-M1-Garand-Gunfire.html
Explosion Effect by JROB774:
https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-explosion-12-frames
Smoke Effect by Pimen:
https://pimen.itch.io/smoke-vfx-1
Tileset by trevor-pumpkin:
https://trevor-pupkin.itch.io/tech-dungeon-roguelite
Thunder Sound by Mike Koenig:
https://soundbible.com/2015-Thunder-Strike-1.html
